title: Saudi Naval Chief calls on CJCSC Gen Sahir Shamshad
content:
RAWALPINDI, Jul 24 (APP):Chief of the Naval Staff, Royal Saudi Naval Forces Vice Admiral Mohammed bin Abdulrahman Al Ghuraybi called on Chairman Joint Chiefs of Staff Committee (CJCSC) General Sahir Shamshad Mirza, NI (M) here Thursday at Joint Staff Headquarters.
Video Playerhttps://www.app.com.pk/wp-content/uploads/2025/07/WhatsApp-Video-2025-07-24-at-14.28.14.mp400:0000:0000:00Use Up/Down Arrow keys to increase or decrease volume.
During the meeting, both dignitaries discussed the evolving regional security dynamics both within Middle East & South Asia with particular focus on maritime security, said a news release issued by Inter Services Public Relations (ISPR).
The CJCSC highlighted the historical brotherly relations between Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Islamic Republic of Pakistan and emphasized mutual resolve for enhancing existing bilateral defence cooperation.
Earlier, upon arrival at Joint Staff Headquarters, a smartly turned-out tri-services contingent presented Guard of Honour to the visiting dignitary
